price: 12 Moïse dit : « J’ai peur, Seigneur, d’être traité d’imposteur,
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī akhāfu an yukadhibūni
